overview:
Eng. Jassim Mohammed Al-Shirawi is the Project Manager for Phase 5 of Ras Laffan Ship repare Yard Project, Managed by Qatar Gas Transportation Company (Nakilat).

Eng. Al Shirawi has held a variety of Project Managment positions, primarily in oil and gas sectors. Prior to Nakilat, Eng. Al Shirawi held certain positions in the field of Engineering and Project Managment within Maersk Oil Qatar.

Starting his engineering career as Industrial Engineer in Maersk Oil Qatar Enigneering and Project Department.

In addition to his role in Nakilat as Project Manager for Phase 5; He is the Project Manger for phase III of Ras Laffan Ship Repair Yard (Facilities for Offshore Structural Fabrication).

Eng. Al Shirawi holds a Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering from University of Arizon at Tucson, United State of America, and a Masterâ€™s Degree in Business Administartion from Wales, The United Kingdom.

Eng. Al Shirawi has been awarded “ACAS Wales Prize” for the best overall dissertation MBA and MSc Human Resource Management in the year of 2007 from his university for his outstanding works.
